name: Plunger Escape
description:
A comical game that uses a custom controller made with Arduino, the goal is to complete the levels using this controller that is similar to the player character. 

Made for a college project by Pedro Nardi and Guilherme Brandão.

The components are:

* Potentiometer to rotate the plunger and change it's facing direction.

* Push button for jumping.

The game is physics based so there are many possibilities at each gameplay. it is as challenging as it is fun.

Attention: I do not own any of the songs of the game, below i listed the great songs you can listen in the game, credits goes to their creators!

Soundtrack:

Little Big Planet Series

Rock of Ages Series

World of Goo

Immediate Music
